1370: Soi was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Got married to Aue at age 22 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Aue, Aue, at age 22.
1371: Had a daughter with Aue, Emmelina, at age 23.
1374: Had a son with Aue, Ghodekin, at age 26.
1375: Lost his wife Aue while she was giving birth to Sybillia in 1375.
1378: Lost daughter Emmelina when Emmelina was 8 years old.
Lost daughter Sybillia when Sybillia was 4 years old.
1379: Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 10 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
